title: Verify Tenant's Certificate of Insurance (COI)
description: A new commercial tenant must provide a COI before getting their keys. The agent must verify it meets the lease requirements.

tasks.description: Receive the Certificate of Insurance (COI) from the new tenant.
Compare the coverage amounts and named insured parties on the COI against the insurance requirements specified in the lease.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the liability coverage meets the $2M requirement and the landlord is listed as additionally insured.

tasks.description: Approve the COI or notify the tenant of any deficiencies that need to be corrected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the COI is compliant and marks the task as complete.
